main event: A luminous mass was reported falling from the sky in Schlanders, Tirol, Italy on December 18, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting occurred from a hospital window at around 7 to 7:30 PM., The object was described as a large, luminous mass., The observer was unable to see the object hit the ground due to obstruction from a balcony wall., The observer notified a local forest ranger to monitor the area for any remnants., Local newspapers reported that a watch was kept at the site where the luminous object was believed to have fallen.
witness description: a nurse from the Red Cross
